product_description: Staying organized is easier when your supplies are built to handle real work. These Quality Park 12 x 15-1/2 large envelopes are a smart, reliable solution for accessible storage, filing, and project organization at home or in the office. Designed to fit oversized documents without folding, these clasp envelopes help protect important papers like reports, presentations, contracts, manuals, and project materials. The generous size keeps everything easy to access, preserving a clean, professional appearance. Made from heavyweight 28 lb brown kraft paper, these large storage envelopes are built for durability. The sturdy construction stands up to extensive handling, making them ideal for busy offices, classrooms, and long-term filing needs. Each large envelope features a Quality Park–style double prong metal clasp with reinforced holes, allowing for repeated opening and closing without tearing. When you need added security, the heavy gummed flap provides a permanent seal, giving you flexibility based on how the envelope is being used. With a convenient 100 count box, you’ll reduce the need for frequent reordering and keep your workspace running smoothly. Whether you’re organizing projects, archiving files, or managing paperwork, these clasp envelopes help bring order, efficiency, and peace of mind to your day. Reliable, durable, and easy to use, Quality Park envelopes are a smart, practical solution for anyone who values organization, efficiency, and peace of mind. (Manufacturer Item Number: QUA37810)
